nodes.label: First Steps
nodes.description: Lace up your shoes and complete your first run of any distance.

nodes.label: 1K Finisher
nodes.description: Complete a 1 km run without stopping.

nodes.label: 2K Runner
nodes.description: Complete a 2 km run without stopping.

nodes.label: 5K Finisher
nodes.description: Complete your first 5K run (3.1 miles).

nodes.label: 5K Regular
nodes.description: Complete 10 separate 5K runs.

nodes.label: 10K Finisher
nodes.description: Complete your first 10K run (6.2 miles).

nodes.label: 10K Regular
nodes.description: Complete 10 separate 10K runs.

nodes.label: Half Marathon
nodes.description: Complete your first half marathon (21.1 km / 13.1 miles).

nodes.label: Marathon
nodes.description: Complete a full marathon (42.2 km / 26.2 miles).

nodes.label: Ultra Runner
nodes.description: Complete an ultra marathon (50+ km).

nodes.label: 15K Finisher
nodes.description: Complete a 15K run.

nodes.label: 5K Sub-40
nodes.description: Run a 5K in under 40 minutes (8:03/km pace).

nodes.label: 5K Sub-35
nodes.description: Run a 5K in under 35 minutes (7:00/km pace).

nodes.label: 5K Sub-30
nodes.description: Run a 5K in under 30 minutes (6:00/km pace).

nodes.label: 5K Sub-25
nodes.description: Run a 5K in under 25 minutes (5:00/km pace).

nodes.label: 5K Sub-20
nodes.description: Run a 5K in under 20 minutes (4:00/km pace). Elite territory!

nodes.label: 10K Sub-60
nodes.description: Run a 10K in under 60 minutes (6:00/km pace).

nodes.label: 10K Sub-50
nodes.description: Run a 10K in under 50 minutes (5:00/km pace).

nodes.label: 10K Sub-45
nodes.description: Run a 10K in under 45 minutes (4:30/km pace).

nodes.label: Half Sub-2h
nodes.description: Run a half marathon in under 2 hours (5:41/km pace).

nodes.label: Marathon Sub-4h
nodes.description: Run a marathon in under 4 hours (5:41/km pace).

nodes.label: 5K Steps
nodes.description: Walk or run 5,000 steps in a single day.

nodes.label: 10K Steps
nodes.description: Reach 10,000 steps in a single day.

nodes.label: 15K Steps
nodes.description: Reach 15,000 steps in a single day.

nodes.label: 20K Steps
nodes.description: Reach 20,000 steps in a single day.

nodes.label: 30K Steps
nodes.description: Reach 30,000 steps in a single day. That's a big day!

nodes.label: 7-Day Streak
nodes.description: Hit 10,000+ steps every day for 7 consecutive days.

nodes.label: 30-Day Streak
nodes.description: Hit 10,000+ steps every day for 30 consecutive days.

nodes.label: Step Master
nodes.description: Accumulate 1,000,000 total steps.

nodes.label: 50K Steps
nodes.description: Reach 50,000 steps in a single day. Absolute legend.

nodes.label: Find Your Pace
nodes.description: Complete a run while maintaining a consistent pace (Â±15 sec/km).

nodes.label: Negative Split
nodes.description: Run the second half of a 5K faster than the first half.

nodes.label: Tempo Runner
nodes.description: Hold a tempo pace (comfortably hard) for 20 minutes straight.

nodes.label: Interval Initiate
nodes.description: Complete an interval workout: 6x400m with 200m recovery.

nodes.label: Speed Demon
nodes.description: Run a single kilometer in under 4:30.

nodes.label: Sprint King
nodes.description: Run 400m in under 1:30.

nodes.label: Fartlek Fun
nodes.description: Complete a 30-minute fartlek session with at least 8 speed bursts.

nodes.label: Hill Crusher
nodes.description: Complete 10 hill repeats on a steep incline.

nodes.label: Pace Master
nodes.description: Run a 10K with every km split within 10 seconds of your target pace.

nodes.label: First Week
nodes.description: Run at least 3 times in one week.

nodes.label: Two-Week Streak
nodes.description: Run at least 3 times per week for 2 consecutive weeks.

nodes.label: Month Warrior
nodes.description: Run at least 3 times per week for an entire month.

nodes.label: 50 Runs
nodes.description: Complete 50 total runs.

nodes.label: 100 Runs
nodes.description: Complete 100 total runs. You're a real runner now.

nodes.label: 365 Club
nodes.description: Run at least once every week for an entire year.

nodes.label: Run Streak 30
nodes.description: Run every single day for 30 days straight (any distance).

nodes.label: 500 Runs
nodes.description: Complete 500 total runs. Legendary dedication.
